title: minerjones
author: minerjones
content: From makers Elias (elianite) and SatPulse comes the #0001 Edition of the 2023 Limited Edition Autograph Coin & Encyclopedia SetHere is what Elias wanted to say about this collaboration/set:This coin is the first of 1,000 of the 0.001 BTC (1K bits) funded SatPulse bi-metal coin, created for the October 2023 SatPulse Silver Symposium event in Las Vegas and sold out before the event, primarily in rolls of 10. Its center is 0.5 oz silver, and its outer rim is brass. It is the first set of coins minted by Physical Bitcoin Mint, which in late October released its second coin, the ‚ÄòXRP Army Coin‚Äô (1,000 mintage). The COA is directly inspired by the COA of the ‚ÄúAutographs Edition‚Äù of the Encyclopedia of Physical Bitcoins by Elias Ahonen, and a special print of 100 numbered Encyclopedias were produced in conjunction with the event and mint launch. The COA and Encyclopedia are signed by SatPulse and Elias, with both also bearing the numbered 1/1000 hologram on the reverse. This 1/1000 coin and 1/100 Encyclopedia were reserved for its author, and are being auctioned here in order for both to find their way back into the community!STARTING BID: 0.0050BTCMINIMUM BID INCREMENT: 0.0002BTC**Please limit bids to ONLY 4 decimal places**END TIME: OCTOBER 31st, 2023, 14:00:00 PDT**Payment due within 24 hours of auction end!!**SNIPE: Any bid made in last 5 minutes will extend the auction 5 minutes beyond the ending time.If within those 5 extended minutes, a new bid is made, 5 minutes will be added to the auction from the time of that bid.PAYMENT: bc1q0mj9njt50045qfuzewc4rut7su7cvg8nt89j3cSHIPPING: Based on location and preferenceOWNER: Elias (elianite)

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: to help with explaining the differences in the coins mintage.There were 1000 coins made. 974 with ¬†a silver hologram, 15 with a gold hologram all numbered 0000 with letters above QR code, of the 974 there were 11 with errors, those 11 were then used to create 8 with gold holograms with the numbers #1-4 and 97-100 and were accompanied with the book above. The 3 remaining were not used.Quote from: Eclipse33 on October 25, 2023, 02:18:36 AMI want to say, this is freaking awesome and exactly what we need. Can you please post a link to the XRP army coin, I am very interested. https://www.getxrparmycoin.com/get-xrp-army-coin

comments.author: henkcryptotank
comments.body: Oof thats a really nice gesture to bring this one to our forum. üéâüçª¬† Im sure it will bring a lot of new members, as all these coins sold out so fast! Greets Tank

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.created_time: October 25, 2023, 02:33:21 PMLast edit: October 25, 2023, 06:36:10 PM by MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: Quote from: rsincognito on October 25, 2023, 02:31:04 PMhow are they getting away with selling loaded coins (xrp) with crypto on them legally ? that would be a question to ask them. There are lots of makers who currently sell loaded coins.I am not involved with the XRP coins at all. edit:perhaps this is done where this is a "collectible" which is being sold for more than the intrinsic value. And they view this as a non "money transmitting" action.

comments.author: Kryptowerk
comments.body: Crazy rare pieces... I'ma give it a shot, but looking at some celebrity collectors that already joined the auction let's see how this goes.Quote from: MoparMiningLLC on October 25, 2023, 04:35:08 AMto help with explaining the differences in the coins mintage.There were 1000 coins made. 974 with¬† a silver hologram, 15 with a gold hologram all numbered 0000 with letters above QR code, of the 974 there were 11 with errors, those 11 were then used to create 8 with gold holograms with the numbers #1-4 and 97-100 and were accompanied with the book above. The 3 remaining were not used.Ah, thanks for the explanation.So regarding these gold holo coins, all were sold with the book - where did these sales happen?

The 3 remaining were not used.Ah, thanks for the explanation.So regarding these gold holo coins, all were sold with the book - where did these sales happen? 8 accompanied books and are numbered as specified above. 1 of which is in this auction. The 15 with gold holos and numbered '0000' - I cannot answer where all of those went, I only know where 1 of them is.

The 15 with gold holos and numbered '0000' - I cannot answer where all of those went, I only know where 1 of them is. Okay thanks. Will be interesting to see if any others ever pop up on the forum. Sounds almost similar to some of these crazy rare Satori custom chips.Anyway, almost forgot to place my bid: 0.0212 BTC
